channel.title: CVE Feed for StandaloneTech -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StandaloneTech -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-40198|2024-08-03T12:14:40.034Z -- standalonetech -- terawallet%20%E2%80%93%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in StandaloneTech TeraWallet – For WooCommerce plugin <= 1.3.24 leading to plugin settings change.

item.title: CVE-2022-36401|2024-08-03T10:00:04.300Z -- standalonetech -- terawallet%20%E2%80%93%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in TeraWallet – For WooCommerce plugin <= 1.3.24 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32584|2024-06-04T17:51:09.527Z -- standalonetech -- terawallet%20%E2%80%93%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in StandaloneTech TeraWallet – For WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects TeraWallet – For WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.5.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in StandaloneTech TeraWallet – For WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects TeraWallet – For WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.5.0.
